titles.title: SELF Act of 2021

To establish a competitive grant program to support the development, implementation, and evaluation of successful teacher and school leader training programs on family engagement that will increase the capacity of teachers and school leaders to work with families to develop and support the social and emotional skills, habits, and mindsets of children.
SELF Act of 2021
Social Emotional Learning for Families Act of 2021

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

bill.summary:
Social Emotional Learning for Families Act of 2021 or the SELF Act of 2021
This bill directs the Department of Education to award grants to local educational agencies to develop, implement, and evaluate teacher and school leader training programs on family engagement.
